Get Query page url

Source: R/getQueryUrl.R
getQueryUrl.Rd

Get naver news query page url withput pageNum.

getQueryUrl(query, st = "news.all", q_enc = "EUC-KR", r_enc = "UTF-8",
  r_format = "xml", rp = "none", sm = "all.basic", ic = "all",
  so = "datetime.dsc", startDate = as.Date(Sys.time()) - 3,
  endDate = as.Date(Sys.time()), stPaper = "exist:1", detail = 1,
  pd = 1, dnaSo = "rel.dsc")

Arguments

query

requred.
st

Default is news.all.
q_enc

Default is euc-kr.
r_enc

Default is UTF-8.
r_format

Default is xml.
rp

Default is none.
sm

Default is all.basic.
ic

Default is all.
so

Default is datetime.dsc.
startDate

Dfault is 3 days before today.
endDate

Default is today.
stPaper

Default is exist:1.
detail

Default is 1 means only display title.
pd

Default is 1.
dnaSo

Default is rel.dsc.

Value

Get url.

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
